title: Kouhai no Ai ga Omosugiru!
description: Fujiwara hate's the school hero, Ichijyou. In an attempt to get revenge on him, he tries to get a girlfriend first but its all no no avail. One day, Ichijyou confesses his love to him. Hoping to take advantage of his weakness, Fujiwara agress to date him, but thats when the unexpected happens, and Ichijyou boldly pushes him down in the classroom...
